channel.title: Error Connecting To Server
channel.description:
When I try logging into the client it says, "Error connecting to server".
I changed the all the "127.0.0.1" to my host name which is Blahblah.no-ip.biz ( changed it in the client.java )
I port fowarded port 43594 already
Install JDK and java (Newest versions)
Any help will be greatful, if sombody would help me on teamviewer i would not hesitate to donate them on paypal!

item.title: Error Connecting To Server
item.dc:creator: @Official_Pepsi Official Pepsi
item.description:
@Official_Pepsi wrote:

When I try logging into the client it says, “Error connecting to server”.

I changed the all the “127.0.0.1” to my host name which is Blahblah.no-ip.biz ( changed it in the client.java )

I port fowarded port 43594 already

Install JDK and java (Newest versions)

Any help will be greatful, if sombody would help me on teamviewer i would not hesitate to donate them on paypal!
